name: Arjun Sharma
bio: Performance marketing specialist with 5+ years of experience in digital advertising, analytics, and growth strategy. Expert in Google Ads, Meta Ads, and conversion optimization.

name: Priya Patel
bio: Visual storyteller with expertise in brand design, creative strategy, and content production. Specializes in creating compelling ad creatives that convert.

name: Rahul Kumar
bio: Data scientist and analyst with deep expertise in marketing attribution, customer journey mapping, and predictive analytics using advanced statistical models.

name: Sarah Johnson
bio: Strategic consultant specializing in business growth, market expansion, and operational efficiency. Helps brands scale from startup to enterprise level.
